title: Stonehenge
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,365 words, Level W (Grade 4), Lexile 1040L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     N and Z1
description: The mysteries of Stonehenge are many. Why was it built? How did its builders move and place stones weighing more than a school bus? Students will learn about the scientific theories that try to explain the meaning of this UNESCO World Heritage site.
